title: Insert Chart Option Not Translated into Chinese in Context Menu
description: When using the software in a Chinese environment, the 'Insert Chart' option in the context menu is not translated into Chinese.
OB: The 'Insert Chart' option in the context menu is displayed in English when the software is used in a Chinese environment.
EB: The 'Insert Chart' option in the context menu should be displayed in Chinese when the software is used in a Chinese environment.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Set the software environment to Chinese.
2. Create a report.
3. Right-click to open the context menu and observe that the 'Insert Chart' option is displayed in English instead of Chinese.
